name: Gorrilla tag REMAKE
description:
I remade gorrilla tag as a exploration game with absolutly NO purpose at all :) There will be frequent updates to this and will one day be multiplayer and/or have a playable game mode, So far all you can do is jump from tree to tree and explore the OLD gorrilla tag map! 

Also Subscribe to my Youtube channel EternalGoose.

If you have any suggestions for upcoming updates, add them in the comments and i will see if i can impliment them, im also working on remaking Hogwarts Legacy so definently check that out. Thanks!
